name: A Planet in the Fog (RUBIKA)
description:
A PLANET IN THE FOG is a first-person exploration game in which you play an astronaut on an exoplanet covered in a mysterious fog. Go on expeditions, explore the treacherous environment and study the ecosystem in order to discover the planet's true nature.

Graduation Video Game 

School : RUBIKA (France)
Year : 2020
Platform: PC 
Engine: Unity
Number of player: 1
Genre: Adventure

Explore a mysterious planet covered in a thick fog

A Planet in the Fog is a first person exploration game in which you play as a scientist sent on a planet covered in a dense fog to study it. Navigate the steep landscape and find your way throught the fog during your expeditions to reveal its mysteries.

This is a student graduation project, developed in a year, by 9 students from Rubika Supinfogame, France. The game was made with Unreal Engine 4.

Controls
  • WASD : Move
  • Spacebar : Jump
  • Mouse : Camera 
  • Mouse Wheel : Item selection
  • Right / Left Click : Use item
  • E : Interact with item
  • Shift : Sprint
  • Tab : Open map
